remarks: Membership in an ordered pair class builder.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
copsex2ga.1 $e |- ( A = <. x , y >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elopaba $p |- ( A e. { <. x , y >. | ps } <-> ( A e. ( _V X. _V ) /\ ph ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ph x y $.
